name: Night Night Sleep Tight
description: this is a short survival horror game where your a little kid who has constant nightmares .to defend your self from ghost jump and click on the teddy bear whilst your touching the teddy bear. to defend your self from demons go over to the dog and click on it. use the dancing dino to keep your panic meter low . if the panic meter turns completely indigo the nightmares will appear to get rid of him you have keep your panic meter low. also this game has lore.
